titleStmt.title: K. Henry IV with the humours of Sir John Falstaff : a tragi-comedy as it is acted at the theatre in Little-Lincolns-Inn-Fields by His Majesty's servants : revived with alterations / written originally by Mr. Shakespear.
titleStmt.author: Betterton, Thomas, 1635?-1710.
Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616. King Henry IV. Part 1.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.W. and sold by John Deeve ...,

notesStmt.note: The first part only, adapted by Thomas Betterton. Cf. Bartlett.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
